version_description:
*****Having issues with the app? Contact us - we reply to every email: support@thepianoapp.com *****

- Major bug fixes related to the online song library.
- Now you can listen to downloaded songs offline (My Song Library > Downloaded Songs tab).
- Fixed a bug where some midi files can cause the app to freeze during the "Loading.." state.
- Bug fixes related to color themes on iPad.
- Removed the TOS notice that pops each time you try to upload a new midi file to the online song library.

What's new in version 2:

This is the biggest and the most important update so far; perhaps even more important than the initial release itself!
- iOS 8 Ready
- New Audio & Midi engine:
Background Audio support
Inter-App Audio support
Audiobus 2 Support
Audio recorder (with HQ 44.1khz Audio)
Midi recorder
AudioCopy
Now you can save your recorded Audio/Midi files locally for offline playing, or send them via Email
New “Dynamics Processor” filter for richer and louder sound
Improved audio latency when connected to a midi keyboard
Improved piano sound
- Improved PianoRoll with real time scrubbing (now you can seek the song backward-forward in real time)
- Added pinch zoom to the PianoRoll
- New “Score View” camera
- All new online song library :
+300 new songs
Songs are added daily
You can upload your own midi files to the song library. Other users will be able to download it and view/learn the song interactively
Added search feature to the online song library
- New UI
- Improved Performance
- Dramatically reduced battery drain during long play sessions
- Numerous bug fixes and improvements!
- Now optimized for the iPhone 6 / 6 Plus / The New iPads

Wifi connection is required to access the online features. The app does not currently support access to online features when connected to a cellular network. We are working on improving this in our upcoming updates.

*****Having issues with the app? Contact us - we reply to every email: support@thepianoapp.com *****
- The ability to practice left/right hands separately
- The ability to mute certain midi channels for midi files with more than one instrument.
- Favorites Playlist with continuous play for downloaded songs (for premium/basic/pro users only)
- You can now hide the toolbar & enjoy a full-screen experience
- Tap to play mode is now available in all camera modes!
- The ability to disable the internal sound (useful when using the app as a midi controller)
- The ability to disable the compressor audio filter.
- You can now access online features on cellular networks :)
- New score view options
- Improved piano roll
- You can now step the song note by note (backward/forward) by pausing the playback at anytime
- Major bug fixes & Improvements!

What's new in version 2:

- iOS 8 Ready
- New Audio & Midi engine:
Background Audio support
Inter-App Audio support
Audiobus 2 Support
Audio recorder (with HQ 44.1khz Audio)
Midi recorder
AudioCopy
Now you can save your recorded Audio/Midi files locally for offline playing, or send them via Email
New “Dynamics Processor” filter for richer and louder sound
Improved audio latency when connected to a midi keyboard
Improved piano sound
- Improved PianoRoll with real time scrubbing (now you can seek the song backward-forward in real time)
- Added pinch zoom to the PianoRoll
- New “Score View” camera
- All new online song library :
+300 new songs
Songs are added daily
You can upload your own midi files to the song library. Other users will be able to download it and view/learn the song interactively
Added search feature to the online song library
- New UI
- Improved Performance
- Dramatically reduced battery drain during long play sessions
- Numerous bug fixes and improvements!
- Now optimized for the iPhone 6 / 6 Plus / The New iPads

*****Having issues with the app? Contact us - we reply to every email: support@thepianoapp.com *****
iOS 9 support
Added support for the new iPod Touch.
64 bit support
Next/Previous Note buttons are now bigger and easier to hit :)
Fixed compatibility issues with unsupported midi file formats.
Fixed compatibility issue with some midi interfaces that caused faulty midi recordings (see “Alternate midi recorder” option in the settings menu).
Various other bug fixes

- Fixed iPhone 6S/6S Plus UI Scaling
- Fixed occasional freeze on startup.

This is massive update brings you:

- Support for new iPhones
- Augmented reality support (on supported devices): Place the piano in your room and walk around it, the closest experience you will get to owning a real piano!
- New Instrument! A fully detailed antique mechanical player piano, featuring*:
. Ridiculously detailed graphics with a custom paper roll for each song
. Meticulously sampled piano sound recorded from a real upright piano with up to 8 velocity samples per key
- New background strings instrument
- Real time preview of songs in the songs browser: You can now "see" the structure of the song while scrolling without having to open the song.
- You can now change the writing on the piano :)
- Support Chinese interface (enabled by default if your device language is set to Chinese)

*Available to premium subscribers

This is massive update brings you:

- Support for new iPhones
- Augmented reality (on supported devices): Place the piano in your room and walk around it, the closest experience you will get to owning a real piano!
- New Instrument: A fully detailed antique mechanical player piano, featuring*:
. Ridiculously detailed graphics with a custom paper roll for each song
. Meticulously sampled piano sound recorded from a real upright piano with up to 8 velocity samples per key
- New background strings instrument
- Real time preview of songs in the songs browser: You can now "see" the structure of the song while scrolling without having to open the song.
- You can now change the writing on the piano :)
- Support for Chinese interface and other languages

*Available to premium subscribers

This is massive update brings you:

- Support for new iPhones
- Augmented reality (on supported devices): Place the piano in your room and walk around it, the closest experience you will get to owning a real piano!
- New Instrument: A fully detailed antique mechanical player piano, featuring*:
. Ridiculously detailed graphics with a custom paper roll for each song
. Meticulously sampled piano sound recorded from a real upright piano with up to 8 velocity samples per key
- New background strings instrument
- Real time preview of songs in the songs browser: You can now "see" the structure of the song while scrolling without having to open the song.
- You can now change the writing on the piano :)
- Support for Chinese interface and other languages

*Available to premium subscribers

Added support for over 20 languages!
Improvements for AR workflow
Added the option to disable auto-play on start

**Don't forget to support us and rate the app after each update. We read every review!**

- More free (Public domain) songs!
- Added 3D Touch support
- Improved compatibility with iOS 10.3
- Made the next/previous note buttons respect loop when enabled.
- Added seconds to see song play progress.
- Made it easier to know which song is playing.
- Made it possible to toggle the labels on the keyboard (Learn View).
- Added the option to lock keyboard in Learn and Orbit modes.
- Made it possible to hide the top toolbar (tap the small arrow under the settings menu icon)
- (New devices) Piano roll notes now have rounded edges.
- (New devices) Added note labels to piano roll notes.
- Large performance gains when loading complex midi files.
- Performance improvements for old devices.
- Bug fixes :)

- Added support for new iPhones
- You can now customize pianos with your favorite colours and change room visibility.
- Piano roll notes now also appear in 3D modes and AR.
- Fixed a bug where tapping the correct notes wouldn’t take you to the next note if you’ve changed visible hands.
- Fixed song playback when certain settings are turned off
- Made it possible to change app language from settings
- Redesigned settings menu
- Other bug fixes and improvements
Added iPad ProMotion support: Enjoy eye-watering 120 fps graphics and responsiveness on the new iPad Pro!
